author: R Rajaram
text:
A 62-year-old Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam member was arrested at Nagore on Thursday on the charge of indecently portraying the Chief Minister on his Facebook page.

The accused, S. Mohammed Ameen, was arrested on a complaint lodged by the AIADMK Nagore Town unit secretary S. Ramzan Ali. The accused did not hold any position in the DMK.

Police sources said Ameen had posted indecent remarks a few days ago on his Facebook account against the Chief Minister along with her photo taken several years ago.

Acting on the complaint, the Nagore police arrested him on Thursday evening and produced him before a magistrate who remanded him in judicial custody.

The police slapped cases under IPC sections including 504 (intentional insult with intent to provoke breach of peace) 507 (criminal intimidation by an anonymous communication) besides Section 6 read with Section 4 of Indecent Representation of Women (Prohibition) Act, 1986.
title: DMK man held for ‘indecent remarks’ against CM on Facebook
